entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING , Vaudreuil-Dorion
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:19 PM EST Thursday 19 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Snow at times heavy. Temperature steady near minus 2.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow at times heavy beginning this evening. Local blowing snow overnight. Amount 10 cm. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50. Temperature steady near minus 2. Wind chill near minus 8. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Thursday 19 January 2023

entry.title: Friday: Snow at times heavy. Temperature steady near minus 2.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy and local blowing snow changing to light snow near noon. Amount 5 cm. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50. Temperature steady near minus 2. Wind chill near minus 8. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Thursday 19 January 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Light snow. Low minus 8.
entry.summary: Light snow ending in the evening then cloudy. Wind northeast 20 km/h becoming light in the evening. Low minus 8. Wind chill near minus 11. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Thursday 19 January 2023
